tool.name: Load a GFF3 file
tool.command:
tripal load_gff3
--organism '${organism}'
--analysis '${analysis}'
--import-mode '${import_mode}'
#if str($naming.mode) == 'manual': --re-mrna '${naming.re_mrna}' --re-protein '${naming.re_protein}' #end if
#if str($advanced.landmark_type): --landmark-type '${advanced.landmark_type}' #end if
#if str($advanced.alt_id_attr): --alt-id-attr '${advanced.alt_id_attr}' #end if
${advanced.create_organism}
#if str($target.target_organism): --target-organism '${target.target_organism}' #end if
#if str($target.target_type): --target-type '${target.target_type}' #end if
${target.target_create}
@AUTH@
'${gff3}'
> $output_log

param.name: gff3
param.label: Path to GFF3 file
param.help: the path must be accessibe from the Tripal server

param.name: organism
param.label: Organism name
param.help: abbreviation or common name as created with the 'Create Organism' tool

param.name: analysis
param.label: Analysis name
param.help: as named in the 'Create Analysis' tool

param.name: import_mode
param.label: Loading method
param.option: Import everything, update when already existing

param.name: mode
param.label: Naming method for proteins
param.help: in case your GFF file does not contain polypeptide features

param.name: re_mrna
param.label: Regular expression for the mRNA name
param.help: this regex will be used to extract parts of the mRNA feature name

param.name: re_protein
param.label: Replacement string for the protein name
param.help: will be used to generate the protein name based on the mRNA name

param.name: landmark_type
param.label: Landmark type
param.help: A Sequence Ontology type for the landmark sequences in the GFF fie (e.g. \'chromosome\'). Will be used to create them if they don't already exist.

param.name: alt_id_attr
param.label: ID attribute
param.help: Name of the GFF attribute that contains a unique identifier for each feature. Leave empty to use the 'ID' attribute

param.name: create_organism
param.label: Create organisms specified in 'organism' attribute
param.help: If not found, create features referenced in the target attribute.

param.name: target_organism
param.label: Target organism name
param.help: Name of organism corresponding to target attribute. Abbreviation or common name as created with the 'Create Organism' tool.

param.name: target_type
param.label: Target feature type
param.help: Type of features referenced in the target attribute. Should be a Sequence Ontology term.

param.name: target_create
param.label: Create target features
param.help: If not found, create features referenced in the target attribute.
